title: Inside the Global Effort to Keep Perfectly Good Food Out of the Dump
description: Around the world, lawmakers and entrepreneurs are taking steps to tackle two of humanity’s most pressing problems: hunger and climate change.
dc:creator: Somini Sengupta
media:credit: Andri Tambunan for The New York Times
media:description: Vue Vang collected donated food from a Trader Joe’s in Fresno, Calif., where, under a new law, grocery stores are required to donate “the maximum amount of edible food that would otherwise be disposed.”
